Why I Write

Writing for others forces clarity that journaling doesnâ€™t. You canâ€™t hide behind â€œI know what I meanâ€ when someone else has to understand it. My father suggested I start this blog, and he was right â€” each post sharpens thinking that would have stayed vague in private notes.
